typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		Customeralternetkey as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Gender as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		DateFirstPurchase as string,
		PhoneNo as string,
		Email as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		AddressID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(FullName = concat(concat(FirstName,''),LastName),
		MonthlyIncome = toLong(YearlyIncome)/12) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as string,
		Customeralternetkey as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		FullName as string,
		Gender as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		DateFirstPurchase as string,
		PhoneNo as string,
		Email as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		AddressID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		Customeralternetkey,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		FullName = DerivedColumn1@FullName,
		Gender,
		BirthDate,
		DateFirstPurchase,
		PhoneNo,
		Email,
		YearlyIncome,
		AddressID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
